sentence.Network_en: The Edinburgh International Festival offers enough choice to satiate most appetites.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱丁堡国际艺术节上活动丰富，大多数人都会尽兴而归。

sentence.Network_en: The dinner was enough to satiate the gourmets.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚餐足以让这些美食家们大饱口福。

sentence.Network_en: In review a novel, you shall try to titillate rather than satiate the reader's interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 评论一本小说的时候, 你应想办法刺激而不是满足读者的兴趣.

收藏查看语义饱和本词条缺少信息栏、名片图，补充相关内容使词条更完整，还能快速升级，赶紧来吧！ 看一个字久了会觉得不认识,这个现象其实很普遍。不仅是汉字，英语等其它语言的使用者也会出现“一个词看久了就认不出”的现象。甚至不仅在语言中，就连一幅熟人的照片、一个熟悉的地点，看久了之后都有可能会突然觉得陌生起来。[br/]　这个现象在西方被叫做Jamais vu。针对它的研究早在20世纪60年代就已开展。[br/]　一些学者用“语义饱和”（Semantic satiation）来解释这个现象。他们认为：[b
satiation 饱和satiation effect 满足效应satiety 餍足状态

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin satiatus, past participle of satiare, from satis 'enough'

entry.tran: 使满足;使充分享受;使过饱;使腻烦
entry.def: If something such as food or pleasure satiates you, you have all that you need or all that you want of it, often so much that you become tired of it.

example.ex: The dinner was enough to satiate the gourmets...
example.tran: 晚餐足以让这些美食家们大饱口福。

example.ex: The Edinburgh International Festival offers enough choice to satiate most appetites.
example.tran: 爱丁堡国际艺术节上活动丰富，大多数人都会尽兴而归。

means.word_mean: 2. overeat or eat immodestly; make a pig of oneself;

auth_sentence.content: There is usually enough fruit on a tree to satiate...them.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is usually enough fruit on a tree to satiate...them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is usually enough fruit on a tree to satiate...them.

auth_sentence.content: Zinc tablets can also satiate the perceived need for a drug-based treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zinc tablets can also satiate the perceived need for a drug-based treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zinc tablets can also satiate the perceived need for a drug-based treatment.

auth_sentence.content: Fat helps satiate the appetite while fat-free diets can also keep a person hungry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fat helps satiate the appetite while fat-free diets can also keep a person hungry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fat helps satiate the appetite while fat-free diets can also keep a person hungry.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+satiate[v.使饱足,生腻]→adj.不知足的,欲壑难填的
sati足够,饱足+able能……的→adj.可满足的
sate=sati足够,饱足→v.使心满意足,使厌足
sati足够,饱足+ate表动词→v.使饱足,生腻

sentences.en: The girl was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at one.
sentences.cn: 这女孩吃香蕉吃腻了, 见了它连看都不想看。
